thread.title: Top-seeded Ferrer routs Garcia-Lopez 6-1, 6-1 in Vienna
thread.title_full: Top-seeded Ferrer routs Garcia-Lopez 6-1, 6-1 in Vienna

author: New details show what fueled road-rage killing
title: Top-seeded Ferrer routs Garcia-Lopez 6-1, 6-1 in Vienna
text:
Top-seeded Ferrer routs Garcia-Lopez 6-1, 6-1 in Vienna Associated Press 1 day ago Â© Photo by Kevin Lee/Getty Images David Ferrer of Spain returns a shot against Bernard Tomic of Australia during their men's singles second round match on day 4 of Shanghai Rolex Masters at Qi Zhong Tennis Centre on October 14, 2015 in Shanghai, China. VIENNA (AP) Top-seeded David Ferrer routed fellow Spaniard Guillermo Garcia-Lopez 6-1, 6-1 at the Erste Bank Open on Thursday to reach his 12th quarterfinal of the season.
AdChoices Ferrer saved two break points early in the opening set and converted five of eight chances on Garcia-Lopez's serve.
The ninth-ranked Ferrer will next play Fabio Fognini, who downed Czech veteran Radek Stepanek 6-1, 6-4.
The eighth-seeded Italian broke Stepanek twice in the opening set und used his only break point at 5-4 in the second to close out the win.
Also, Steve Johnson of the United States defeated Jerzy Janowicz of Poland 6-4, 6-7 (7), 6-4 for his third quarterfinal of the year and first since reaching the semifinals in Winston-Salem in August.
